briefTitle: Non-Invasive Artificial Intelligence-Based Platform MonIToring Program (NIP IT!)
officialTitle: Non-Invasive Artificial Intelligence-Based Platform MonIToring Program (NIP IT!)
conditions: Breast Cancer, Melanoma, Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumor
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from Baseline in ctDNA collected from biospecimens
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients with histological confirmation of a solid tumor.
2. Patients must have early stage or locally advanced disease that is planned for or have undergone curative treatment.
3. Patient must be ≥ 18 years old.
4. All patients must have signed and dated an informed consent form.

Exclusion Criteria:

None
